ygData.subject: RE: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves...
ygData.msgSnippet: bastige!  I hope you rot in level Hell 30 for a good two to three days!  WTG on 30 Harm!!  You cant make money if you are so bz power levvving.  You need to
ygData.messageBody:
bastige! I hope you rot in level Hell 30 for a good two to three days! <g>

WTG on 30 Harm!! You cant make money if you are so bz power levvving. You
need to travel around and spend all your time in tells. Fiting mobs really
slows down the money making and deal doing. Once you get a decent amount of
capital and make some fiends with players who let you sell their stuffs and
if you like doing it - you can really roll thru the plats.

I have sold easily over 2000pp worth of stuffs in the past 2 weeks. The
FBR's and Golden Black pearl Chokers go for lotsa plat. The 200pp stuffs
are mid levels. But nabbing a dirk or combine here and selling it there is
bread and butter 30 to pp trades.

My weapon collection now includes:
(in no particular order)
combine long slasher
dragoon dirk
screaming mace (with 1hb at 7 kinda sucks)
polish garnet tommychopper
ashenwood short stabber
barbed leather whip
ten-tickle whip (I love to beam smiles :-)
combine scim (have not tried this one yet)
crookstinger
chrys knife (I think - maybe sold it)
cracked dark wood shield (any one know if this can be repaired?)
bronze 2h sword (who knows I may give to a warrior)
fine steel dagger? (maybe just bronze - in my emergency road kit)
kite shield
wood shield (it was my first one and I just kept it)

normally I keep a stock of giant snake fangs on hand for young bards I meet
- need to replenish my inv. Still looking for some of the more rare daggers
- pugious & jamybia.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 22st song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. my chitin shield went bye-bye in a dim pocket along with 3 fs weps when
"SYSTEM MESSAGE: log out now - servers are going down for maintenace..."
C'est la vie.


-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:slasher@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 12:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide
gloves...

From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>

Topic was why did Harmonic chide Sylly for 50pp and Estella
for 75pp for elfhide gloves.

1) When you are level 19 (which I was) you don't just throw
out 50pp or more on something like that. Hell, you are

lucky to make 25pp on a hard working night.
Don't play me off as some cheap bastard like I was 11 levels
ago,
when I was lucky to make 10pp a night. I'm pulling down
around
50pp a night or so and I'm happy as a clam to spend my
money. =)

Harmonic Distortion, 30th drummer.
